title: Bitcoin miner fees stay elevated, boosting daily revenue to $1.8M
description:
Quick Take Looking at Bitcoin miner fees, they are still elevated compared to previous years. The total fee paid to miners is currently around 70 Bitcoin per day, $1.8 million. Before Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens became a thing this year, on average, miners received around 20 Bitcoin daily. The percentage of miner revenue derived from […]

The post Bitcoin miner fees stay elevated, boosting daily revenue to $1.8M appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Binance likely updated bitcoin confirmation process, on-chain data reveals
description: Recent developments on Binance's consolidation transactions have sparked discussions, especially in the wake of the Bitcoin Core 25.0 update
